channel.description:
credit to @techwolves for this idea. Since i made an BD inquis here: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-rework-the-inquisitor-bd/44594/10 I realised that the inquisitor is now more general. Because of this, i decided to rework the Sorcerer.
> ## [color=indigo]The Sorcerer[/color] :shield: > **[color=gray]Neutral Killer[/color]** **Mage Armour (Passive) -** Immune to death at night, occupation, target changing, poison and bleeding. **Perception (Passive) -** If you were about to take an action that would cause your death, it will be cancelled. **Confusion Spell (Day) -** Choose a player. For the rest of the game , they will appear suspicious. - 2 uses **Chant of Fury (Day)-** Your next kill will not require a visit. - 2 uses **Magic Missile (Night)-** Fire a magic missile at a player, killing them. **Circle of Death (Night)-** Everyone visiting target player will die. (Unavailable before Night 3) _Kill all members of the main factions._
Because the Inquis/sorceror are no longer a cat and mouse type of deal ill probably make two classes to fit that. CHANGELOG: 14/2/18 Updated it to Look like a FoL class card. 14/2/18 Changed **Confusion Spel**l's wording. From appearing evil to appearing suspicious.

item.title: [Class Rework] The Sorcerer [Now Fully NK]
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
credit to @techwolves for this idea.
Since i made an BD inquis here:
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-rework-the-inquisitor-bd/44594/10
I realised that the inquisitor is now more general. Because of this, i decided to rework the Sorcerer.

The Sorcerer

Neutral Killer
Mage Armour (Passive) - Immune to death at night, occupation, target changing, poison and bleeding.
Perception (Passive) - If you were about to take an action that would cause your death, it will be cancelled.
Confusion Spell (Day) - Choose a player. For the rest of the game , they will appear suspicious. - 2 uses
Chant of Fury (Day)- Your next kill will not require a visit. - 2 uses
Magic Missile (Night)- Fire a magic missile at a player, killing them.
Circle of Death (Night)- Everyone visiting target player will die. (Unavailable before Night 3)
Kill all members of the main factions.

Because the Inquis/sorceror are no longer a cat and mouse type of deal ill probably make two classes to fit that.

14/2/18 Updated it to Look like a FoL class card.
14/2/18 Changed Confusion Spell’s wording. From appearing evil to appearing suspicious.
